original_text: And the priest shall pour some of the oil into the palm of his own left hand,
korean_text: 제사장은 그 기름을 자기 왼쪽 손바닥에 따르고

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall pour some of the oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 기름 일부를 부을 것이며,

sentences.original_text: into the palm of his own left hand,
